features: Fatigue reduction: Positioned on the body’s natural trigger points, the integrated, breathable NSO patches help improve muscle tone, micro blood circulation and cellular balance for faster recovery and performance

Lightweight comfort: The stretchy Payen Altitude fabric dries quickly, the Merrow seams are soft, the clean-cut hems limit chaffing, and the silicon-free Faitplast tape at the waist keeps the tight in place
Easy storage: Integrated into the waistband, the deep 360° pocket system is perfect for storing all your essentials, replacing a 4-liter pack
Silicone free grip tape: Silicone free treatment that offers a secure, confident grip
360° mesh storage pocket system: A stretch waist belt with mesh pockets all around for maximum versatility and fast stowing on the go
Nso: Developed over more than 10 years with insights from leading athletes, eNosyntex™ technology reduces fatigue and restores balance using infrared reflection and metallic oxides
